The beginning<S>746</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>;
As<S>5613</S> it is written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, I<S>1473</S> send<S>649</S> my<S>3450</S> messenger<S>32</S> before<S>4253</S> thy<S>4675</S> face<S>4383</S>, which<S>3739</S> shall prepare<S>2680</S> thy<S>4675</S> way<S>3598</S> before<S>1715</S> thee<S>4675</S>.
The voice<S>5456</S> of one crying<S>994</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>, Prepare ye<S>2090</S> the way<S>3598</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, make<S>4160</S> his<S>846</S> paths<S>5147</S> straight<S>2117</S>.
John<S>2491</S> did<S>1096</S> baptize<S>907</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>, and<S>2532</S> preach<S>2784</S> the baptism<S>908</S> of repentance<S>3341</S> for<S>1519</S> the remission<S>859</S> of sins<S>266</S>. <sup>for: or, unto</sup>
And<S>2532</S> there went out<S>1607</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> all<S>3956</S> the land<S>5561</S> of Judaea<S>2449</S>, and<S>2532</S> they of Jerusalem<S>2415</S>, and<S>2532</S> were<S>907</S> all<S>3956</S> baptized<S>907</S> of<S>5259</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the river<S>4215</S> of Jordan<S>2446</S>, confessing<S>1843</S> their<S>846</S> sins<S>266</S>.
And<S>1161</S> John<S>2491</S> was<S>2258</S> clothed<S>1746</S> with camel's<S>2574</S> hair<S>2359</S>, and<S>2532</S> with a girdle<S>2223</S> of a skin<S>1193</S> about<S>4012</S> his<S>846</S> loins<S>3751</S>; and<S>2532</S> he did eat<S>2068</S> locusts<S>200</S> and<S>2532</S> wild<S>66</S> honey<S>3192</S>;
And<S>2532</S> preached<S>2784</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, There cometh<S>2064</S> one mightier than<S>2478</S> I<S>3450</S> after<S>3694</S> me<S>3450</S>, the latchet<S>2438</S> of whose<S>3739</S> shoes<S>846</S> <S>5266</S> I am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> worthy<S>2425</S> to stoop down<S>2955</S> and unloose<S>3089</S>.
I<S>1473</S> indeed<S>3303</S> have baptized<S>907</S> you<S>5209</S> with<S>1722</S> water<S>5204</S>: but<S>1161</S> he<S>846</S> shall baptize<S>907</S> you<S>5209</S> with<S>1722</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>1565</S> days<S>2250</S>, that Jesus<S>2424</S> came<S>2064</S> from<S>575</S> Nazareth<S>3478</S> of Galilee<S>1056</S>, and<S>2532</S> was baptized<S>907</S> of<S>5259</S> John<S>2491</S> in<S>1519</S> Jordan<S>2446</S>.
And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> coming up<S>305</S> out of<S>575</S> the water<S>5204</S>, he saw<S>1492</S> the heavens<S>3772</S> opened<S>4977</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> like<S>5616</S> a dove<S>4058</S> descending<S>2597</S> upon<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>: <sup>opened: or, cloven, or, rent</sup>
And<S>2532</S> there came<S>1096</S> a voice<S>5456</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, saying, Thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> my<S>3450</S> beloved<S>27</S> Son<S>5207</S>, in<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> I am well pleased<S>2106</S>.
And<S>2532</S> immediately<S>2117</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> driveth<S>1544</S> him<S>846</S> into<S>1519</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he was<S>2258</S> there<S>1563</S> in<S>1722</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S> forty<S>5062</S> days<S>2250</S>, tempted<S>3985</S> of<S>5259</S> Satan<S>4567</S>; and<S>2532</S> was<S>2258</S> with<S>3326</S> the wild beasts<S>2342</S>; and<S>2532</S> the angels<S>32</S> ministered<S>1247</S> unto him<S>846</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> after<S>3326</S> that John<S>2491</S> was put in prison<S>3860</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, preaching<S>2784</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>,
And<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> The time<S>2540</S> is fulfilled<S>4137</S>, and<S>2532</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S> is at hand<S>1448</S>: repent ye<S>3340</S>, and<S>2532</S> believe<S>4100</S> <S>1722</S> the gospel<S>2098</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> as he walked<S>4043</S> by<S>3844</S> the sea<S>2281</S> of Galilee<S>1056</S>, he saw<S>1492</S> Simon<S>4613</S> and<S>2532</S> Andrew<S>406</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> casting<S>906</S> a net<S>293</S> into<S>1722</S> the sea<S>2281</S>: for<S>1063</S> they were<S>2258</S> fishers<S>231</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Come ye<S>1205</S> after<S>3694</S> me<S>3450</S>, and<S>2532</S> I will make<S>4160</S> you<S>5209</S> to become<S>1096</S> fishers<S>231</S> of men<S>444</S>.
And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> they forsook<S>863</S> their<S>846</S> nets<S>1350</S>, and followed<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he had gone<S>4260</S> a little<S>3641</S> further<S>4260</S> thence<S>1564</S>, he saw<S>1492</S> James<S>2385</S> the son <S>3588</S> of Zebedee<S>2199</S>, and<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S>, who<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> were in<S>1722</S> the ship<S>4143</S> mending<S>2675</S> their nets<S>1350</S>.
And<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> he called<S>2564</S> them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> they left<S>863</S> their<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S> Zebedee<S>2199</S> in<S>1722</S> the ship<S>4143</S> with<S>3326</S> the hired servants<S>3411</S>, and went<S>565</S> after<S>3694</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they went<S>1531</S> into<S>1519</S> Capernaum<S>2584</S>; and<S>2532</S> straightway<S>2112</S> on the sabbath day<S>4521</S> he entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the synagogue<S>4864</S>, and taught<S>1321</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they were astonished<S>1605</S> at<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> doctrine<S>1322</S>: for<S>1063</S> he taught<S>1321</S> <S>2258</S> them<S>846</S> as<S>5613</S> one that had<S>2192</S> authority<S>1849</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> as<S>5613</S> the scribes<S>1122</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there was<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> synagogue<S>4864</S> a man<S>444</S> with<S>1722</S> an unclean<S>169</S> spirit<S>4151</S>; and<S>2532</S> he cried out<S>349</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, Let us alone<S>1436</S>; what<S>5101</S> have we<S>2254</S> to do<S>2532</S> with thee<S>4671</S>, thou Jesus<S>2424</S> of Nazareth<S>3479</S>? art thou come<S>2064</S> to destroy<S>622</S> us<S>2248</S>? I know<S>1492</S> thee<S>4571</S> who<S>5101</S> thou art<S>1488</S>, the Holy One<S>40</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> rebuked<S>2008</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Hold thy peace<S>5392</S>, and<S>2532</S> come<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when the unclean<S>169</S> spirit<S>4151</S> had torn<S>4682</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> cried<S>2896</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, he came<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they were<S>2284</S> all<S>3956</S> amazed<S>2284</S>, insomuch that<S>5620</S> they questioned<S>4802</S> among<S>4314</S> themselves<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, What thing<S>5101</S> is<S>2076</S> this<S>3778</S>? what<S>5101</S> new<S>2537</S> doctrine<S>1322</S> is this<S>5124</S>? for<S>3754</S> with<S>2596</S> authority<S>1849</S> commandeth<S>2004</S> he even<S>2532</S> the unclean<S>169</S> spirits<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> they do obey<S>5219</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> immediately<S>2117</S> his<S>846</S> fame<S>189</S> spread abroad<S>1831</S> throughout<S>1519</S> all<S>3650</S> the region round about<S>4066</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>.
And<S>2532</S> forthwith<S>2112</S>, when they were come<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> the synagogue<S>4864</S>, they entered<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the house<S>3614</S> of Simon<S>4613</S> and<S>2532</S> Andrew<S>406</S>, with<S>3326</S> James<S>2385</S> and<S>2532</S> John<S>2491</S>.
But<S>1161</S> Simon's<S>4613</S> wife's mother<S>3994</S> lay<S>2621</S> sick of a fever<S>4445</S>, and<S>2532</S> anon<S>2112</S> they tell<S>3004</S> him<S>846</S> of<S>4012</S> her<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he came<S>4334</S> and took<S>2902</S> her<S>846</S> by the hand<S>5495</S>, and lifted<S>1453</S> her<S>846</S> up<S>1453</S>; and<S>2532</S> immediately<S>2112</S> the fever<S>4446</S> left<S>863</S> her<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> she ministered<S>1247</S> unto them<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> at<S>1096</S> even<S>3798</S>, when<S>3753</S> the sun<S>2246</S> did set<S>1416</S>, they brought<S>5342</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> all<S>3956</S> that were<S>2192</S> diseased<S>2560</S>, and<S>2532</S> them that were possessed with devils<S>1139</S>.
And<S>2532</S> all<S>3650</S> the city<S>4172</S> was<S>2258</S> gathered together<S>1996</S> at<S>4314</S> the door<S>2374</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he healed<S>2323</S> many<S>4183</S> that were<S>2192</S> sick<S>2560</S> of divers<S>4164</S> diseases<S>3554</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast out<S>1544</S> many<S>4183</S> devils<S>1140</S>; and<S>2532</S> suffered<S>863</S> not<S>3756</S> the devils<S>1140</S> to speak<S>2980</S>, because<S>3754</S> they knew<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>. <sup>to speak: or, to say that they knew him</sup>
And<S>2532</S> in the morning<S>4404</S>, rising up<S>450</S> a great while<S>3029</S> before day<S>1773</S>, he went out<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> departed<S>565</S> into<S>1519</S> a solitary<S>2048</S> place<S>5117</S>, and there<S>2546</S> prayed<S>4336</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Simon<S>4613</S> and<S>2532</S> they that were with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S> followed after<S>2614</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when they had found<S>2147</S> him<S>846</S>, they said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>,<S>3754</S> All<S>3956</S> men seek<S>2212</S> for thee<S>4571</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Let us go<S>71</S> into<S>1519</S> the next<S>2192</S> towns<S>2969</S>, that<S>2443</S> I may preach<S>2784</S> there also<S>2546</S>: for<S>1063</S> therefore<S>1519</S> <S>5124</S> came I forth<S>1831</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he preached<S>2784</S> <S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> synagogues<S>4864</S> throughout<S>1519</S> all<S>3650</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast out<S>1544</S> devils<S>1140</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there came<S>2064</S> a leper<S>3015</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, beseeching<S>3870</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> kneeling down<S>1120</S> to him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> saying<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>,<S>3754</S> If<S>1437</S> thou wilt<S>2309</S>, thou canst<S>1410</S> make<S>2511</S> me<S>3165</S> clean<S>2511</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, moved with compassion<S>4697</S>, put forth<S>1614</S> his hand<S>5495</S>, and touched<S>680</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, I will<S>2309</S>; be thou clean<S>2511</S>.
And<S>2532</S> as soon as he<S>846</S> had spoken<S>2036</S>, immediately<S>2112</S> the leprosy<S>3014</S> departed<S>565</S> from<S>575</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> he was cleansed<S>2511</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he straitly charged<S>1690</S> him<S>846</S>, and forthwith<S>2112</S> sent<S>1544</S> him<S>846</S> away<S>1544</S>;
And<S>2532</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, See<S>3708</S> thou say<S>2036</S> nothing<S>3367</S> to any man<S>3367</S>: but<S>235</S> go thy way<S>5217</S>, shew<S>1166</S> thyself<S>4572</S> to the priest<S>2409</S>, and<S>2532</S> offer<S>4374</S> for<S>4012</S> thy<S>4675</S> cleansing<S>2512</S> those things<S>3739</S> which Moses<S>3475</S> commanded<S>4367</S>, for<S>1519</S> a testimony<S>3142</S> unto them<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he went out<S>1831</S>, and began<S>756</S> to publish<S>2784</S> it much<S>4183</S>, and<S>2532</S> to blaze abroad<S>1310</S> the matter<S>3056</S>, insomuch that<S>5620</S> Jesus<S>846</S> could<S>1410</S> no more<S>3371</S> openly<S>5320</S> enter<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the city<S>4172</S>, but<S>235</S> was<S>2258</S> without<S>1854</S> in<S>1722</S> desert<S>2048</S> places<S>5117</S>: and<S>2532</S> they came<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> from every quarter<S>3836</S>.
